no_more_50_words: Most  bars that serve alcohol are inside of buildings, and so, usually, hanging out at a bar is an activity that could only be done inside. Exceptions to the "bars are inside" rule include: rooftop bars, and oceanside bars on beaches.

Hanging out at a bar can be fun and entertaining, especially if you're feeling bored. At a bar, you can socialize with friends, meet new people, and enjoy games like pool, darts, or foosball. You can also listen to live music or watch sports on TV. Plus, you can enjoy a variety of drinks and snacks while you're there.

Hanging out at a bar also offers a variety of activities, depending on the type of bar you choose to go to. For example, some bars offer trivia nights and karaoke, while others feature live bands or DJs. You may even find bars with unique events, such as open mic nights or stand-up comedy shows. With so many possibilities, there's something for everyone at a bar.
